client
Class UserCommandService

java.lang.Object
  client.UserCommandService

public final class UserCommandService
extends java.lang.Object

Class that acts as a facade between a user and the trading system.

Author:
Urvi

connect

public long connect(User user)
             throws AlreadyConnectedException,
                    InvalidArgumentException
Connects user to the trading system

Parameters:
user - The User to be connected
Returns:
A connection id once connection is established
Throws:
AlreadyConnectedException - if User has connected previously
InvalidArgumentException - if User is null

disConnect

public void disConnect(java.lang.String username,
                       long connId)
                throws UserNotConnectedException,
                       InvalidConnectionIdException,
                       InvalidArgumentException
Disconnects User from the trading system

Parameters:
username - The name of the User to be disconnected
connId - Connection id of the User that needs to be verified
Throws:
UserNotConnectedException - if the User never connected
InvalidConnectionIdException - if the connection id is not found by the trading system
InvalidArgumentException

getBookDepth

public java.lang.String[][] getBookDepth(java.lang.String username,
                                         long connId,
                                         java.lang.String product)
                                  throws UserNotConnectedException,
                                         InvalidConnectionIdException,
                                         NoSuchProductException,
                                         InvalidArgumentException
After verifying the user, this method calls ProductService's getBookDepth() method

Parameters:
username - Name of the user to verify
connId - Connection id of the User that needs to be verified
product - Stock symbol for which depth is requested
Returns:
Result of call to ProductService.getBookDepth()
Throws:
UserNotConnectedException
InvalidConnectionIdException
NoSuchProductException
InvalidArgumentException
See Also:
verifyUser(String, long), ProductService.getBookDepth(String)

public java.lang.String submitOrder(java.lang.String username,
                                    long connId,
                                    java.lang.String product,

                                    int volume,
                                    Tradable.Side side)
                             throws InvalidMarketStateException,
                                    NoSuchProductException,
                                    InvalidArgumentException,
                                    InvalidVolumeValueException,
                                    UserNotConnectedException,
                                    InvalidConnectionIdException
After verifying the user, this method calls ProductService's submitOrder(Order) method

Parameters:
username - The name of the User to verify
connId - Connection id of the User that needs to be verified
product - The stock symbol for which to submit an order
price - The Price at which to place the order
volume - The quantity that user wishes to trade
side - The side of the trade (BUY or SELL)
Returns:
Order id of the submitted order
Throws:
InvalidMarketStateException
NoSuchProductException
InvalidArgumentException
InvalidVolumeValueException
UserNotConnectedException
InvalidConnectionIdException
See Also:

                              NoSuchProductException,
                              InvalidArgumentException,
                              InvalidVolumeValueException,
                              OrderNotFoundException,
                              UserNotConnectedException,
                              InvalidConnectionIdException

Parameters:
username - The name of the User to verify
connId - Connection id of the User that needs to be verified
product - The stock symbol for the order that user wishes to cancel
side - The side of the book represented by the order (BUY or SELL)
orderId - The id of the order to be cancelled
Throws:
InvalidMarketStateException
NoSuchProductException

subscribeCurrentMarket

public void subscribeCurrentMarket(java.lang.String username,
                                   long connId,
                                   java.lang.String product)
                            throws UserNotConnectedException,
                                   InvalidConnectionIdException,
                                   AlreadySubscribedException,
                                   InvalidArgumentException
After verifying the user, this method calls CurrentMarketPublisher's subscribe method

Parameters:
username - The name of the User to verify
connId - Connection id of the User that needs to be verified
product - The stock symbol to subscribe for CurrentMarketPublisher updates
Throws:
UserNotConnectedException
InvalidConnectionIdException
AlreadySubscribedException
InvalidArgumentException - if username is null or empty
See Also:
verifyUser(String, long), CurrentMarketPublisher.subscribe(User, String)
